mapper.select: SELECT * FROM administrator ad JOIN employee e ON e.employee_ID = ad.employee_ID JOIN jobs js ON e.jobs_id = js.jobs_id

SELECT ad.admin_ID AS admin_id, e.name AS name, e.employee_ID AS employee_id, js.jobs_name AS jobs_name, e.tel AS tel, e.email AS email, ad.permission_code AS permission_code, ad.creation_code AS creation_code, ad.user_status AS user_status FROM administrator ad JOIN employee e ON e.employee_ID = ad.employee_ID JOIN jobs js ON e.jobs_id = js.jobs_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND ad.admin_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND js.jobs_name = #{searchKeyword}
AND e.name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND e.tel LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND e.email LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND e.employee_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND TO_DATE(ad.creation_code, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(ad.creation_code, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(e.hire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(e.hire_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ad.permission_code = #{permissionCode}
